background_description: You live in the grey space between those who have power and those who donâ€™t. You find opportunity where others see only chaos. With nimble fingers, you unburden both the richest merchant and the lowliest guard.

Catring.description: Recharge: Place the ring on a stray cat's tail.

Gildfinger.description: Recharge: bundle it with at least 100gp for a night.

Glimpse Glass.description: It shatters after the last use.

Sweetwhistle.description: Recharge: Lose a dear memory (describe it).

Vagrant's Veil.description: Recharge: Donate the day's winnings to the poor.

table1.question: What was your last big job? Roll 1d6:

options.description: A noble's summer home. The place was full of fancy wine (+20gp) but not much else. Take Fence Cutters.
A bank (you were caught). You bear a brand only visible by firelight, and anyone that sees the mark can ask you for a beer. Take Retractable Wires.
A guild warehouse. Take a Ladder (bulky, 10ft) and Blinding Powder (1 use).
Moneylender. Someone beat you to the job, but left behind a Scroll of Arcane Eye (petty).
Constable's quarters. You escaped, but left some friends behind. Take Strong Silk Rope (30ft) and a queasy feeling.
A university. You were seen, but not pursued. You still don't know why. Take Smoke Pellets (3 uses).
Climb up walls and fall safely.
A finger glove that mimics any mundane key.
A monocle that lets you see through walls or other obstructions.
Listeners hear a soft, familiar voice in the distance that they cannot resist following.
Wear it to blend seamlessly into crowds, appearing as a simple pauper.
Crush to release a dense cloud of smoke that follows you.
